df-clim
blocks.content: Define the limit relation for complex number sequences. See ~ clim for its relational expression. (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-2005.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-clim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cli, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cc), wral(s2, crp, wrex(s3, cz, wral(s4, cfv(cuz, cv(s3)), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s4)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s4)), cmin, cv(s1))), clt, cv(s2)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-clim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  โข ~~> = { < s0, s1 > |(s1 โ โ โง โ(s2 โ โ+, โ(s3 โ โค, โ(s4 โ(โคโฅ ` s3),((s0 ` s4)โ โ โง(abs `((s0 ` s4)[-]s1))[<]s2)))))}
  โฃ d(s0, s3)
  โฃ d(s0, s4)
  โฃ d(s0, s2)
  โฃ d(s0, s1)
  โฃ d(s3, s4)
  โฃ d(s2, s3)
  โฃ d(s1, s3)
  โฃ d(s2, s4)
  โฃ d(s1, s4)
  โฃ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: df-rlim
blocks.content: Define the limit relation for partial functions on the reals. See ~ rlim for its relational expression. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-rlim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(crli, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cc, cpm, cr)), wcel(cv(s1), cc)), wral(s2, crp, wrex(s3, cr, wral(s4, cdm(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s3), cle, cv(s4)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s4)), cmin, cv(s1))), clt, cv(s2)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-rlim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  โข ~~>r = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 โ(โ[pโฆ]โ)โง s1 โ โ)โง โ(s2 โ โ+, โ(s3 โ โ, โ(s4 โ dom(s0),(s3[โค]s4 โ(abs `((s0 ` s4)[-]s1))[<]s2)))))}
  โฃ d(s0, s4)
  โฃ d(s0, s1)
  โฃ d(s0, s2)
  โฃ d(s0, s3)
  โฃ d(s1, s4)
  โฃ d(s2, s4)
  โฃ d(s3, s4)
  โฃ d(s1, s2)
  โฃ d(s1, s3)
  โฃ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-o1
blocks.content: Define the set of eventually bounded functions. We don't bother to build the full conception of big-O notation, because we can represent any big-O in terms of ` O(1) ` and division, and any little-O in terms of a limit and division. We could also use limsup for this, but it only works on integer sequences, while this will work for real sequences or integer sequences. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-o1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(co1, crab(s0, co(cc, cpm, cr), wrex(s1, cr, wrex(s2, cr, wral(s3, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3))), cle, cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-lo1
blocks.content: Define the set of eventually upper bounded real functions. This fills a gap in ` O(1) ` coverage, to express statements like ` f ( x ) <_ g ( x ) + O ( x ) ` via ` ( x e. RR+ |-> ( f ( x ) - g ( x ) ) / x ) e. <_O(1) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-lo1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(clo1, crab(s0, co(cr, cpm, cr), wrex(s1, cr, wrex(s2, cr, wral(s3, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)), wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cle, cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
}

blocks.name: climrel
blocks.content: The limit relation is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climrel() {
  |- wrel(cli)
} = {
  relopabi(hs2, hs0, cli, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wral(hs3, crp, wrex(hs4, cz, wral(hs1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs4)), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), cmin, cv(hs0))), clt, cv(hs3))))))))
  df-clim(hs2, hs0, hs3, hs4, hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs4.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
}

  โข Rel(~~>)
} = {
  relopabi(hs2, hs0, cli, (hs0 โ โ โง โ(hs3 โ โ+, โ(hs4 โ โค, โ(hs1 โ(โคโฅ ` hs4),((hs2 ` hs1)โ โ โง(abs `((hs2 ` hs1)[-]hs0))[<]hs3))))))
  df-clim(hs2, hs0, hs3, hs4, hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs4.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
}

blocks.name: rlimrel
blocks.content: The limit relation is a relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rlimrel() {
  |- wrel(crli)
} = {
  relopabi(hs0, hs1, crli, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cc, cpm, cr)), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wral(hs4, crp, wrex(hs2, cr, wral(hs3, cdm(cv(hs0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs2), cle, cv(hs3)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs4))))))))
  df-rlim(hs0, hs1, hs4, hs2, hs3)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs4.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs4.s(hs2)
}

blocks.name: clim
blocks.content: Express the predicate: The limit of complex number sequence ` F ` is ` A ` , or ` F ` converges to ` A ` . This means that for any real ` x ` , no matter how small, there always exists an integer ` j ` such that the absolute difference of any later complex number in the sequence and the limit is less than ` x ` . (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm clim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0)))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), cz)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))))
  pm5.21ndd(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  a1i(w0, wi(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wcel(c1, universe)))
  brrelex2i(c0, cli, c1)

  rexbidv(s1, cz, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s2)), cmin, cv(hs0))), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0)))))

blocks.name: rlim
blocks.content: Express the predicate: The limit of complex number function ` F ` is ` C ` , or ` F ` converges to ` C ` , in the real sense. This means that for any real ` x ` , no matter how small, there always exists a number ` y ` such that the absolute difference of any number in the function beyond ` y ` and the limit is less than ` x ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: rlim2lt
blocks.content: Use strictly less-than in place of less equal in the real limit predicate. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2014.)

thm climcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wcel(c1, cc))
} = {
  simpld(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wcel(c1, cc), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(hs2, cz, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs1)))))))
  ibi(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(hs2, cz, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs1))))))))
  clim(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), universe, wbr(c0, cli, c1))
  brrelex1i(c0, cli, c1)
  climrel()
  eqidd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(c0, cli, c1))
  diff.hs2.w(wbr(c0, cli, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, cli, c1))
}

blocks.name: lo1bdd2
blocks.content: If an eventually bounded function is bounded on every interval ` A i^i ( -oo , y ) ` by a function ` M ( y ) ` , then the function is bounded on the whole domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: lo1bddrp
blocks.content: Refine ~ o1bdd2 to give a strictly positive upper bound. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2016.)

thm lo1bddrp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, crp, wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), clo1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cr), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s2)))), wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), cr), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))), wbr(c1, cle, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, crp, wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, crp, wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  mpd(w0, wrex(s0, crp, wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))))

  ge0p1rpd(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  absge0d(cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  ralimdva(s1, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(c1, cle, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1)))
  mpan2d(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(c1, cle, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1)))
  letrd(cv(hs0), co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  leabsd(cv(hs0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  lep1d(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wi(wa(wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1))), wbr(c1, cle, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1))), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cr))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(c1, cr))
  simplr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cr), wcel(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cr))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cr))

  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr))

  letr(c1, cv(hs0), co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1))

  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr))

  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)

  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cabs, cv(hs0))
  diff.cabs.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(c2, cle, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

} = {

  lenegd(c2, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

blocks.name: o1lo1d

blocks.name: icco1
blocks.content: Derive eventual boundedness from separate upper and lower eventual bounds. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Apr-2016.)

thm icco1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(c1, co(c3, cicc, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {

  mpbid(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c3)), wbr(c3, cle, c1))

  mpbid(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))), w3a(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c3, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, cicc, c4)))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0))), wb(wcel(c1, co(c3, cicc, c4)), w3a(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c3, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c4))))

blocks.name: o1bdd2
blocks.content: If an eventually bounded function is bounded on every interval ` A i^i ( -oo , y ) ` by a function ` M ( y ) ` , then the function is bounded on the whole domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2016.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm o1bdd2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), co1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cr), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s2)))), wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), cr), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))), wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), cle, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  lo1bdd2(s0, s1, s2, c0, cfv(cabs, c1), c2, c3, w0)
  abscld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  mpbid(w0, wcel(cmpt(s1, c0, cfv(cabs, c1)), clo1), wcel(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), co1))
  lo1o12(s1, c0, c1, w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cabs, c1)
  diff.cabs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cabs, c1)
  diff.cabs.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: rlimclim
blocks.content: A sequence on an upper integer set converges in the real sense iff it converges in the integer sense. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.content: Produce a real limit from an integer limit, where the real function is only dependent on the integer part of ` x ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2016.)

blocks.name: climconst2
blocks.content: A constant sequence converges to its value. (Contributed by NM, 6-Feb-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climconst2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(cxp(c2, csn(c0)), cli, c0))
  -| wss(cfv(cuz, c1), c2)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
} = {
  climconst(hs0, cxp(c2, csn(c0)), c0, cfv(cuz, c1), c1, universe, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cz)))
  eqid(cfv(cuz, c1))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cz))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(cxp(c2, csn(c0)), universe))
  xpex(c2, csn(c0))
  snex(c0)
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wceq(cfv(cxp(c2, csn(c0)), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cz))
  sseli(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1), c2)
  fvconst2g(c0, cc, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c2, csn(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cuz, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cz)))
}

blocks.name: rlimdm
blocks.content: Two ways to express that a function has a limit. (The expression ` ( ~~>r `` F ) ` is sometimes useful as a shorthand for "the unique limit of the function ` F ` "). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rlimdm(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cdm(crli)), wbr(c0, crli, cfv(crli, c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(csup(c1, cxr, clt), cpnf))
} = {
  impbid1(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(crli)), wbr(c0, crli, cfv(crli, c0)))
  syl5(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(crli)), wbr(c0, crli, cfv(crli, c0)), wex(hs0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cdm(crli)), wex(hs0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0))))
  eldmg(hs0, c0, cdm(crli), crli)
  exlimdv(hs0, w0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, crli, cfv(crli, c0)))
  ex(w0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, crli, cfv(crli, c0)))
  breqtrrd(c0, crli, cfv(crli, c0), cv(hs0), wa(w0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0))))
  syl5eq(cfv(crli, c0), cv(hs0), cio(hs1, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs1))), wa(w0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0))))
  df-fv(hs1, crli, c0)
  elvd(hs0, wa(w0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0))), wceq(cio(hs1, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs1))), cv(hs0)))
  iota5(hs1, cv(hs0), universe, wa(w0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0))), wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs1)))
  adantr(wa(w0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wb(wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  impbid(wa(w0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0))), wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  expr(w0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  rlimuni(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c0, c1, wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs1)))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs1))), wf(c0, c1, cc))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs1))), wceq(csup(c1, cxr, clt), cpnf))
  simprr(w0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs1)))
  simprl(w0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs1)))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(w0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs1)), wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0)))
  simpr(w0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0)))
  breq2(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c0, crli)
  releldmi(c0, crli, cfv(crli, c0))
  rlimrel()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crli)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, crli, cfv(crli, c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(crli)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0))))
}

thm rlimdm(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  โข (w0 โ(c0 โ dom(~~>r)โ c0[~~>r](~~>r ` c0)))
  โฃ (w0 โ(c0 : c1 โ โ))
  โฃ (w0 โ sup(c1, โ*, <)= +โ)
} = {
  impbid1(w0, c0 โ dom(~~>r), c0[~~>r](~~>r ` c0))
  syl5(w0, c0 โ dom(~~>r), c0[~~>r](~~>r ` c0), โ(hs0, c0[~~>r]hs0))
  ibi(c0 โ dom(~~>r), โ(hs0, c0[~~>r]hs0))
  eldmg(hs0, c0, dom(~~>r), crli)
  exlimdv(hs0, w0, c0[~~>r]hs0, c0[~~>r](~~>r ` c0))
  ex(w0, c0[~~>r]hs0, c0[~~>r](~~>r ` c0))
  breqtrrd(c0, crli, (~~>r ` c0), hs0, (w0 โง c0[~~>r]hs0))
  syl5eq((~~>r ` c0), hs0, iota(hs1, c0[~~>r]hs1), (w0 โง c0[~~>r]hs0))
  df-fv(hs1, crli, c0)
  elvd(hs0, (w0 โง c0[~~>r]hs0), iota(hs1, c0[~~>r]hs1)= hs0)
  iota5(hs1, hs0, universe, (w0 โง c0[~~>r]hs0), c0[~~>r]hs1)
  adantr((w0 โง c0[~~>r]hs0), hs0 โ ๐, (c0[~~>r]hs1 โ hs1 = hs0))
  impbid((w0 โง c0[~~>r]hs0), c0[~~>r]hs1, hs1 = hs0)
  expr(w0, c0[~~>r]hs0, c0[~~>r]hs1, hs1 = hs0)
  rlimuni(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, (w0 โง(c0[~~>r]hs0 โง c0[~~>r]hs1)))
  adantr(w0, (c0[~~>r]hs0 โง c0[~~>r]hs1), (c0 : c1 โ โ))
  adantr(w0, (c0[~~>r]hs0 โง c0[~~>r]hs1), sup(c1, โ*, <)= +โ)
  simprr(w0, c0[~~>r]hs0, c0[~~>r]hs1)
  simprl(w0, c0[~~>r]hs0, c0[~~>r]hs1)
  syl5ibrcom((w0 โง c0[~~>r]hs0), hs1 = hs0, c0[~~>r]hs1, c0[~~>r]hs0)
  simpr(w0, c0[~~>r]hs0)
  breq2(hs1, hs0, c0, crli)
  releldmi(c0, crli, (~~>r ` c0))
  rlimrel()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crli)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0[~~>r](~~>r ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(crli)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.w((w0 โง c0[~~>r]hs0))
}

blocks.name: climuni
blocks.content: An infinite sequence of complex numbers converges to at most one limit. (Contributed by NM, 2-Oct-1999.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)

thm climuni(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c0, cli, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))

  1z()

  3expia(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c0, cli, c2), wne(c1, c2), wn(wcel(nat1, cz)))
  mpd(w3a(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c0, cli, c2), wne(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(nat1, cz)), wrex(hs1, cn, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wa(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c1)), clt, co(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cdiv, nat2))), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c2)), clt, co(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cdiv, nat2)))))))
  sylanbrc(w3a(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c0, cli, c2), wne(c1, c2)), wrex(hs1, cn, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wa(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c1)), clt, co(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cdiv, nat2))), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c2)), clt, co(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cdiv, nat2)))))), wrex(hs1, cn, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c1)), clt, co(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cdiv, nat2))))), wrex(hs1, cn, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c2)), clt, co(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cdiv, nat2))))))
  climi(hs1, hs0, cn, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, co(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cdiv, nat2), nat1, c0, w3a(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c0, cli, c2), wne(c1, c2)))
  simp1(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c0, cli, c2), wne(c1, c2))
  climi(hs1, hs0, cn, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2, co(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cdiv, nat2), nat1, c0, w3a(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c0, cli, c2), wne(c1, c2)))

blocks.name: fclim
blocks.content: The limit relation is function-like, and with range the complex numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fclim() {
  |- wf(cli, cdm(cli), cc)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wf(cli, cdm(cli), cc), wfn(cli, cdm(cli)), wss(crn(cli), cc))
  mpbi(wfn(cli, cdm(cli)), wfun(cli))
  mpbir2an(wfun(cli), wrel(cli), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))
  climrel()
  ax-gen(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))
  ax-gen(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  ax-gen(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  climuni(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  dffun2(hs0, hs1, hs2, cli)
  funfn(cli)
  ssriv(hs1, crn(cli), cc)
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs1), crn(cli)), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wex(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs1))))
  elrn(hs0, cv(hs1), cli)
  vex(hs1)
  exlimiv(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cc))
  climcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  df-f(cli, cdm(cli), cc)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(cli)
  diff.hs1.c(cli)
  diff.hs2.c(cli)
  diff.hs1.c(crn(cli))
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(hs1), cc))
}

thm climeu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cli, c1), weu(s0, wbr(c0, cli, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylanblrc(wbr(c0, cli, c1), weu(s0, wbr(c0, cli, cv(s0))), wex(hs0, wbr(c0, cli, cv(hs0))), wal(hs0, wal(s0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, cli, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, cli, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  mpcom(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wex(hs0, wbr(c0, cli, cv(hs0))), wcel(c1, cc))
  climcl(c0, c1)
  spcegv(hs0, c1, cc, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c0, cli, cv(hs0)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cli)
  gen2(hs0, s0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, cli, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, cli, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  climuni(c0, cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  bitri(weu(s0, wbr(c0, cli, cv(s0))), wa(wex(hs0, wbr(c0, cli, cv(hs0))), wal(hs0, wal(s0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, cli, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, cli, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))), weu(hs0, wbr(c0, cli, cv(hs0))))
  cbveu(s0, hs0, wbr(c0, cli, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, cli, cv(hs0)))
  nfv(hs0, wbr(c0, cli, cv(s0)))
  nfv(s0, wbr(c0, cli, cv(hs0)))
  breq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0, cli)
  eu4(hs0, s0, wbr(c0, cli, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, cli, cv(s0)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0, cli)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, cli, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, cli, cv(s0)))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cli, cv(hs0))
  diff.cli.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: rlimres

blocks.name: o1res
blocks.content: The restriction of an eventually bounded function is eventually bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)

blocks.name: rlimresb
blocks.content: The restriction of a function to an unbounded-above interval converges iff the original converges. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: o1resb
blocks.content: The restriction of a function to an unbounded-above interval is eventually bounded iff the original is eventually bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: climeq
blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal to one another have the same limit. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Nov-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climeq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c2, cli, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  bitr4d(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c2, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(hs0, crp, wrex(hs1, c3, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs0))))))))
  clim2(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c1, c3, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c4, c5, w0)
  clim2(hs0, hs1, s0, c2, c1, c3, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c4, c6, w0)
  eqidd(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: lo1eq

blocks.name: rlimeq

  3eqtr3g(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), cres(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), cres(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), w0)
  3eqtr4g(cres(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), cres(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))), w0)
  3eqtr4g(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))), cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)), c1), cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)), c3), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)), c1, c3, w0)

  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c4, cle, cv(s0)))

  simprd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sylib(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, cico, cpnf))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))))

  elicopnf(c4, cv(s0))
  ax-mp(wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))), cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)), c1)), wss(cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)), c0))
  resmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)), c0, c1)

  inss1(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))

  resmpt(s0, c0, c0, c1)
  reseq1(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c4, cico, cpnf))
  mp2b(wceq(cres(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co(c4, cico, cpnf))), wss(c0, c0), wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)))
  ssid(c0)

  reseq1(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co(c4, cico, cpnf))
  rlimresb(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2, c4, c0, wa(w0, wss(c0, cr)))
  adantr(w0, wss(c0, cr), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, cc))
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, cc, w0)
  rlimresb(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c2, c4, c0, wa(w0, wss(c0, cr)))
  adantr(w0, wss(c0, cr), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0, cc))
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c3, cc, w0)

blocks.name: o1eq
blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal to one another are eventually bounded if one of them is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm o1eq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4d(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1)), clo1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c2)), clo1))
  lo1eq(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1), cfv(cabs, c2), c3, w0)
  abscld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  abscld(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fveq2d(cabs, c1, c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0)))))
  lo1o12(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  lo1o12(s0, c0, c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm o1eq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  โข (w0 โ((s0 โ c0 โฆ c1)โ O(1)โ(s0 โ c0 โฆ c2)โ O(1)))

  โฃ ((w0 โง(s0 โ c0 โง c3[โค]s0))โ c1 = c2)
  โฃ d(s0, c0)

} = {
  3bitr4d(w0, (s0 โ c0 โฆ c1)โ O(1), (s0 โ c0 โฆ c2)โ O(1), (s0 โ c0 โฆ(abs ` c1))โ โคO(1), (s0 โ c0 โฆ(abs ` c2))โ โคO(1))
  lo1eq(s0, c0, (abs ` c1), (abs ` c2), c3, w0)

blocks.name: climmpt
blocks.content: Exhibit a function ` G ` with the same convergence properties as the not-quite-function ` F ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wbr(c1, cli, c3), wbr(c4, cli, c3)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c5, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wbr(c1, cli, c3), wbr(c4, cli, c3))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  climeq(hs0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c0, c2, universe, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, universe))
  eqeltri(c4, universe, cmpt(s0, c5, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  mptex(s0, c5, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))
  eqeltri(c5, universe, cfv(cuz, c0))
  fvex(cuz, c0)
  simpl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))
  eqcomd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c5))
  fvmpt(s0, cv(hs0), c5, c4, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c1)
  fvex(c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm climmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  โข ((c0 โ โค โง c1 โ c2)โ(c1[~~>]c3 โ c4[~~>]c3))

  eqeltri(c4, universe, (s0 โ c5 โฆ(c1 ` s0)))

  eqcomd((c1 ` hs0), (c4 ` hs0), hs0 โ c5)

blocks.name: 2clim
blocks.content: If two sequences converge to each other, they converge to the same limit. (Contributed by NM, 24-Dec-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2clim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s1, crp, wrex(s2, c2, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c5, cli, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)

  -| diffsc(s2, c0)

  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wral(hs0, crp, wrex(s2, c2, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs0))))))

blocks.name: climmpt2
blocks.content: Relate an integer limit on a not-quite-function to a real limit. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), crli, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  bitr4d(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), crli, c1), wbr(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cli, c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cli, c1)), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c0, c4))
  climmpt(s0, c3, c0, c4, c1, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), c2)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  rlimclim(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), c1, c2, c3, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc, w0)
  r19.21bi(s0, c2, w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc))
  sylib(w0, wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc)), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc)))
  ralrimiva(s1, c2, w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc))
  bitri(wral(s1, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc)), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc)))
  cbvralv(s1, hs0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc))
  eleq1d(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s1), cv(hs0), c0)
  cbvralv(hs0, s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc))
  eleq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

  cbvralv(s1, hs0, c2, (c0 ` s1)โ โ, (c0 ` hs0)โ โ)

  cbvralv(hs0, s0, c2, (c0 ` hs0)โ โ, (c0 ` s0)โ โ)

blocks.name: climres
blocks.content: A function restricted to upper integers converges iff the original function converges. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)

thm climres(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

blocks.name: rlimrege0
blocks.content: The limit of a sequence of complex numbers with nonnegative real part has nonnegative real part. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2016.)

thm rlimge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {

}

blocks.name: o1compt
blocks.content: Sufficient condition for transforming the index set of an eventually bounded function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm o1compt(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(ccom(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co1))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wrex(s2, cr, wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c2)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  o1co(s1, s2, hs0, c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3, c1, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wrex(s2, cr, wral(hs0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)))))), wrex(s2, cr, wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c2)))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr), wb(wrex(s2, cr, wral(hs0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)))))), wrex(s2, cr, wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c2))))))
  rexbidv(s2, cr, w0, wral(hs0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0))))), wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c2))))
  syl5bb(w0, wral(hs0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0))))), wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c2))), wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0))))))
  cbvral(hs0, s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)))), wi(wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)))))
  nfim(s0, wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0))))
  nfv(s0, wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(hs0)))
  nfbr(s0, cv(s1), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)))
  nfcv(s0, cv(s1))
  nfcv(s0, cle)
  nffvmpt1(s0, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  nfv(hs0, wi(wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0))))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cv(s2), cle)
  breq2d(cv(s1), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))

  imbi2d(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c2))
  breq2d(cv(s1), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  fvmpt2(s0, c1, c2, c3, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s2, s0, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cv(s2), cle, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.name: addcn2
blocks.content: Complex number addition is a continuous function. Part of Proposition 14-4.16 of [Gleason] p. 243. (We write out the definition directly because ~ df-cn and ~ df-cncf are not yet available to us. See ~ addcn for the abbreviated version.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: subcn2
blocks.content: Complex number subtraction is a continuous function. Part of Proposition 14-4.16 of [Gleason] p. 243. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: mulcn2
blocks.content: Complex number multiplication is a continuous function. Part of Proposition 14-4.16 of [Gleason] p. 243. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)

thm cn1lem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {

  ffvelrni(cv(s2), cc, c1, cc)

blocks.name: abscn2
blocks.content: The absolute value function is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm abscn2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wrex(s1, crp, wral(s2, cc, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cabs, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cabs, c0))), clt, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  cn1lem(s0, s1, s2, c0, cabs)
  mp2an(wf(cabs, cc, cc), wf(cabs, cc, cr), wss(cr, cc))
  absf()
  ax-resscn()
  fss(cabs, cc, cr, cc)
  abs2difabs(cv(s2), c0)
  diff.cabs.s(s1)
}

thm cjcn2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wrex(s1, crp, wral(s2, cc, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(ccj, c0))), clt, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  cn1lem(s0, s1, s2, c0, ccj)
  cjf()
  eqled(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(ccj, c0))), cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cc), wcel(c0, cc)))

  eqtr3d(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(ccj, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(ccj, c0))), cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), cfv(cabs, cfv(ccj, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  fveq2d(cabs, cfv(ccj, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), co(cfv(ccj, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(ccj, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  cjsub(cv(s2), c0)

thm recn2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wrex(s1, crp, wral(s2, cc, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cre, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cre, c0))), clt, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

} = {

  mp2an(wf(cre, cc, cc), wf(cre, cc, cr), wss(cr, cc))

  eqbrtrrd(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cre, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cre, c0))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), cfv(cabs, cfv(cre, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  fveq2d(cabs, cfv(cre, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), co(cfv(cre, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(cre, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  resub(cv(s2), c0)
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s2), cc), wcel(c0, cc)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(cre, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0))), wcel(co(cv(s2), cmin, c0), cc))

}

blocks.name: o1sub
blocks.content: The difference of two eventually bounded functions is eventually bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.) (Proof shortened by Fan Zheng, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: rlimo1
blocks.content: Any function with a finite limit is eventually bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rlimo1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, crli, c1), wcel(c0, co1))
} = {
  mpbird(wbr(c0, crli, c1), wcel(c0, co1), wrex(hs0, cr, wrex(hs2, cr, wral(hs1, cdm(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cle, cv(hs2)))))))
  mpd(wbr(c0, crli, c1), wrex(hs0, cr, wrex(hs2, cr, wral(hs1, cdm(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cle, cv(hs2)))))), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, cdm(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cmin, c1)), clt, nat1)))))
  rlimi(hs0, hs1, cdm(c0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), c1, nat1, cc, wbr(c0, crli, c1))
  ralrimiva(hs1, cdm(c0), wbr(c0, crli, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cc))
  a1i(wbr(c0, crli, c1), wcel(nat1, crp))

  โข (w0 โ(s0 โ c0 โฆ(c1[-]c2))โ O(1))

  syl(w0, dom((s0 โ c0 โฆ c1))= c0, โ(s0 โ c0, c1 โ c3))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, c1 โ c3)

blocks.name: lo1add
blocks.content: The sum of two eventually upper bounded functions is eventually upper bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)

blocks.name: lo1mul
blocks.content: The product of an eventually upper bounded function and a positive eventually upper bounded function is eventually upper bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: lo1mul2
blocks.content: The product of an eventually upper bounded function and a positive eventually upper bounded function is eventually upper bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm lo1mul2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmul, c2)), clo1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), clo1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrd(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmul, c2)), clo1, cmpt(s0, c0, co(c2, cmul, c1)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, co(c1, cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, c1), w0)
  mulcomd(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  recnd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  lo1mptrcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  recnd(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  lo1mptrcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  lo1mul(s0, c0, c2, c1, c3, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lo1mul2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  โข (w0 โ(s0 โ c0 โฆ(c1[ร]c2))โ โคO(1))
  โฃ ((w0 โง s0 โ c0)โ c2 โ c3)
  โฃ ((w0 โง s0 โ c0)โ c1 โ c3)
  โฃ (w0 โ(s0 โ c0 โฆ c2)โ โคO(1))
  โฃ (w0 โ(s0 โ c0 โฆ c1)โ โคO(1))
  โฃ ((w0 โง s0 โ c0)โ 0[โค]c2)
  โฃ d(s0, c0)
  โฃ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrd((s0 โ c0 โฆ(c1[ร]c2)), clo1, (s0 โ c0 โฆ(c2[ร]c1)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, (c1[ร]c2), (c2[ร]c1), w0)
  mulcomd(c1, c2, (w0 โง s0 โ c0))
  recnd(c1, (w0 โง s0 โ c0))
  lo1mptrcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  recnd(c2, (w0 โง s0 โ c0))
  lo1mptrcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)

}

blocks.name: o1dif
blocks.content: If the difference of two functions is eventually bounded, eventual boundedness of either one implies the other. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm o1dif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  impbid(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1))
  sylibd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cof(cmin), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), co1))
  syl(w0, wi(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cof(cmin), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), co1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co1))
  expcom(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cof(cmin), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), co1))
  o1sub(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)))
  eleq1d(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cof(cmin), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), co1, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  eqtrd(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cof(cmin), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c2))), w0)
  offval2(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmin, cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), c0, c1, co(c1, cmin, c2), universe, cc, cc, w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c2)), c2, w0)
  nncand(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  sylibd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cof(caddc), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), co1))
  syl(w0, wi(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cof(caddc), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), co1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co1))
  ex(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cof(caddc), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), co1))
  o1add(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  eleq1d(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cof(caddc), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), co1, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  eqtrd(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cof(caddc), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, c2)), w0)
  offval2(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), caddc, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, co(c1, cmin, c2), c2, universe, cc, cc, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wss(c0, cr))
  eqsstr3d(c0, cr, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cc)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cc))
  dmmptg(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2), cc)
  syl(w0, wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), cr), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co1))
  o1dm(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)))
  ssex(c0, cr)
  reex()
  subcld(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, c2), c1, w0)
  npcand(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: lo1sub
blocks.content: The difference of an eventually upper bounded function and an eventually bounded function is eventually upper bounded. The "correct" sharp result here takes the second function to be eventually lower bounded instead of just bounded, but our notation for this is simply ` ( x e. A |-> -u C ) e. <_O(1) ` , so it is just a special case of ~ lo1add . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm lo1sub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clo1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clo1, cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2)), co(c1, cmin, c2), w0)
  negsubd(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  recnd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  recnd(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  lo1add(s0, c0, c1, cneg(c2), cr, w0)
  lo1mptrcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  renegcld(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simprd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c2)), clo1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), clo1))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), clo1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c2)), clo1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1))
  o1lo1(s0, c0, c2, w0)
}

  โข (w0 โ c0[~~>](c1[+]c2))
  โฃ c3 =(โคโฅ ` c4)
  โฃ (w0 โ c4 โ โค)
  โฃ (w0 โ c5[~~>]c2)
  โฃ (w0 โ c1 โ โ)
  โฃ (w0 โ c0 โ c6)
  โฃ ((w0 โง s0 โ c3)โ(c5 ` s0)โ โ)
  โฃ ((w0 โง s0 โ c3)โ(c0 ` s0)=(c1[+](c5 ` s0)))
  โฃ d(s0, c0)
  โฃ d(s0, c1)
  โฃ d(s0, c2)
  โฃ d(s0, c3)
  โฃ d(s0, c4)
  โฃ d(s0, c5)
  โฃ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  breqtrd(c0, cli, (c1[+]c2), (c2[+]c1), w0)
  climaddc1(s0, c0, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  comraddd((c0 ` s0), (c5 ` s0), c1, (w0 โง s0 โ c3))
  adantr(w0, s0 โ c3, c1 โ โ)
  addcomd(c2, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, c2 โ โ, c5[~~>]c2)
  climcl(c5, c2)
}

blocks.name: climmulc2
blocks.content: Limit of a sequence multiplied by a constant ` C ` . Corollary 12-2.2 of [Gleason] p. 171. (Contributed by NM, 24-Sep-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climmulc2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, co(c1, cmul, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c5, cli, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(c1, cmul, cfv(c5, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  climmul(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cxp(cz, csn(c1)), c6, c5, w0)
  sylancl(w0, wbr(cxp(cz, csn(c1)), cli, c1), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(nat0, cz))
  0z()
  climconst2(c1, nat0, cz)
  uzssz(nat0)
  zex()
  eqeltrd(cfv(cxp(cz, csn(c1)), cv(s0)), cc, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c1, cc))
  eqtr4d(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cxp(cz, csn(c1)), cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(c5, cv(s0))), co(c1, cmul, cfv(c5, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  oveq1d(cfv(cxp(cz, csn(c1)), cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(c5, cv(s0)), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(cfv(cxp(cz, csn(c1)), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  eleq2s(cv(s0), c3, cfv(cuz, c4), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  eluzelz(cv(s0), c4)
  fvconst2g(c1, cc, cv(s0), cz)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cz, csn(c1))
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}

  eqtr4d((c0 ` s0), (((โค ร { c1 })` s0)[ร](c5 ` s0)), (c1[ร](c5 ` s0)), (w0 โง s0 โ c3))
  oveq1d(((โค ร { c1 })` s0), cmul, (c5 ` s0), c1, (w0 โง s0 โ c3))
  syl2an(w0, s0 โ c3, ((โค ร { c1 })` s0)= c1, c1 โ โ, s0 โ โค)
  eleq2s(s0, c3, (โคโฅ ` c4), s0 โ โค)

blocks.name: climle
blocks.content: Comparison of the limits of two sequences. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 10-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, cli, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c5, cli, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c5, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c1, cmin, c0)))
  climge0(s0, co(c1, cmin, c0), c2, c3, cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  climsub(s0, cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), c1, c0, c2, c3, c5, universe, c4, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), universe))
  mptex(hs0, c2, co(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))
  fvexi(c2, cuz, c3)
  recnd(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  recnd(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  eqeltrd(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), cv(s0)), cr, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  resubcld(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  breqtrrd(nat0, cle, cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), cv(s0)), co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), wbr(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c5, cv(s0))))
  subge0d(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), cv(s0)), co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))))
  fvmpt(hs0, cv(s0), c2, cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), co(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))
  oveq12d(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c5)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c4)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))))
  ovex(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))
  subge0d(c1, c0, w0)
  climrecl(s0, c1, c2, c3, c5, w0)
  climrecl(s0, c0, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cmin, c0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs0, c2, co(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c5, cv(hs0))

blocks.name: rlimneg
blocks.content: Limit of the negative of a sequence. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rlimneg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1)), crli, cneg(c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crli, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3brtr4g(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1)), crli, cneg(c2), cmpt(s0, c0, co(nat0, cmin, c1)), co(nat0, cmin, c2), w0)
  rlimsub(s0, c0, nat0, c1, nat0, c2, cc, w0)
  0cnd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  rlimmptrcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, c2, w0)
  sylancl(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, nat0), crli, nat0), wss(c0, cr), wcel(nat0, cc))
  eqsstr3d(c0, cr, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c3)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  dmmptg(s0, c0, c1, c3)
  syl(w0, wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr), wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crli, c2))
  rlimss(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2)
  0cn()
  rlimconst(s0, c0, nat0)
  mpteq2i(s0, c0, cneg(c1), co(nat0, cmin, c1))
  df-neg(c1)
  df-neg(c2)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: rlimle
blocks.content: Comparison of the limits of two sequences. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rlimle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(csup(c2, cxr, clt), cpnf))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), crli, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c2, c4), crli, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c4, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(c3, cle, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c1, cmin, c0)))
  rlimge0(s0, co(c1, cmin, c0), c2, co(c4, cmin, c3), w0)
  rlimsub(s0, c2, c4, c3, c1, c0, cr, w0)
  resubcld(c4, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c4, cmin, c3)), wbr(c3, cle, c4))
  subge0d(c4, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  subge0d(c1, c0, w0)
  rlimrecl(s0, c1, c2, c4, w0)
  rlimrecl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cmin, c0)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: rlimsqz
blocks.content: Convergence of a sequence sandwiched between another converging sequence and its limit. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 20-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rlimsqz(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crli, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c4), crli, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c4, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0)))), wbr(c4, cle, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0)))), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  rlimsqzlem(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c2, w0)
  recnd(c2, w0)
  recnd(c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  recnd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  3brtr4d(cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cle, cfv(cabs, co(c4, cmin, c2)), co(c2, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c4), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0)))))
  lesub2dd(c2, c1, c4, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0)))))
  abssuble0d(c1, c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0)))))
  abssuble0d(c4, c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0)))))
  letrd(c4, c2, c1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0)))))
  adantrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0)), wcel(c4, cr))
  adantrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0))), wcel(c2, cr))
}

blocks.name: o1le
blocks.content: Transfer eventual boundedness from a larger function to a smaller function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Sep-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm o1le(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))), wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), cle, cfv(cabs, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1)), clo1))
  lo1le(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1), c2, cfv(cabs, c3), universe, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c3)), clo1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co1))
  lo1o12(s0, c0, c3, w0)
  o1mptrcl(s0, c0, c3, c4, w0)
  fvexd(cabs, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  abscld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  lo1o12(s0, c0, c1, w0)
}

thm o1le(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  โข (w0 โ(s0 โ c0 โฆ c1)โ O(1))
  โฃ (w0 โ c2 โ โ)

  โฃ ((w0 โง s0 โ c0)โ c1 โ โ)
  โฃ ((w0 โง(s0 โ c0 โง c2[โค]s0))โ(abs ` c1)[โค](abs ` c3))
  โฃ d(s0, c0)

} = {

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cli, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

} = {

  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wf(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), c4, cc))

  addass(cv(s0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))

  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))

  eluzelz(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc), wcel(cv(s0), c4))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c4))
  syl6eleqr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c4, cfv(cuz, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)))
  syl6eleq(c0, cfv(cuz, c3), c4, w0)

  diff.hs0.c(cseq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1))

thm clim2ser(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  โข (w0 โ seq((c0[+]1)(+, c1))[~~>](c2[-](seq(c3(+, c1))` c0)))
  โฃ c4 =(โคโฅ ` c3)
  โฃ (w0 โ c0 โ c4)
  โฃ ((w0 โง s0 โ c4)โ(c1 ` s0)โ โ)
  โฃ (w0 โ seq(c3(+, c1))[~~>]c2)
  โฃ d(s0, c0)
  โฃ d(s0, c1)
  โฃ d(s0, c2)
  โฃ d(s0, c3)
  โฃ d(s0, c4)
  โฃ d(s0, w0)

blocks.name: iserex
blocks.content: An infinite series converges, if and only if the series does with initial terms removed. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 9-Feb-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm iserex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpjaod(w0, wb(wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))), wceq(c2, c0), wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  a1i(w0, wi(wceq(c2, c0), wb(wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)))))

blocks.name: isermulc2
blocks.content: Multiplication of an infinite series by a constant. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 14-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Feb-2014.)

thm isermulc2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, co(c2, cmul, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c5), cli, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(c2, cmul, cfv(c5, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, co(c2, cmul, c3))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  climmulc2(hs0, cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2, c3, c4, c0, cseq(c0, caddc, c5), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), universe))
  seqex(c0, caddc, c1)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c4, cseq(c0, caddc, c5), cc, w0)
  serf(s0, c0, c5, c4, w0)
  seqdistr(s0, hs1, c0, caddc, c1, cv(hs0), c2, cmul, c5, cc, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cc))
  addcl(cv(s0), cv(hs1))
  sylan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wceq(co(c2, cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(hs1))), co(co(c2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1)))), wcel(c2, cc))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(c2, cc))
  3expb(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(c2, cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(hs1))), co(co(c2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1)))))
  adddi(c2, cv(s0), cv(hs1))
  syl6eleq(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0), c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cc))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cc), wcel(cv(s0), c4))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(c2, cmul, cfv(c5, cv(s0)))))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(c2, cmul, cfv(c5, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), c4))
  syl6eleqr(cv(s0), c4, cfv(cuz, c0), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, cv(hs0))))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c0, caddc, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c0, caddc, c5))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cmul)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
}

thm isermulc2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  โข (w0 โ seq(c0(+, c1))[~~>](c2[ร]c3))
  โฃ c4 =(โคโฅ ` c0)
  โฃ (w0 โ c0 โ โค)
  โฃ (w0 โ c2 โ โ)
  โฃ (w0 โ seq(c0(+, c5))[~~>]c3)
  โฃ ((w0 โง s0 โ c4)โ(c5 ` s0)โ โ)
  โฃ ((w0 โง s0 โ c4)โ(c1 ` s0)=(c2[ร](c5 ` s0)))
  โฃ d(s0, c0)
  โฃ d(s0, c1)
  โฃ d(s0, c2)
  โฃ d(s0, c3)
  โฃ d(s0, c4)
  โฃ d(s0, c5)
  โฃ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 โ seq(c0(+, c1))[~~>](c2[ร]c3)), d(s0, c3))
  climmulc2(hs0, seq(c0(+, c1)), c2, c3, c4, c0, seq(c0(+, c5)), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, seq(c0(+, c1))โ ๐)
  seqex(c0, caddc, c1)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c4, seq(c0(+, c5)), cc, w0)
  serf(s0, c0, c5, c4, w0)
  seqdistr(s0, hs1, c0, caddc, c1, hs0, c2, cmul, c5, cc, (w0 โง hs0 โ c4))
  adantl((w0 โง hs0 โ c4), (s0 โ โ โง hs1 โ โ), (s0[+]hs1)โ โ)
  addcl(s0, hs1)
  sylan((w0 โง hs0 โ c4), (s0 โ โ โง hs1 โ โ), (c2[ร](s0[+]hs1))=((c2[ร]s0)[+](c2[ร]hs1)), c2 โ โ)
  adantr(w0, hs0 โ c4, c2 โ โ)
  3expb(c2 โ โ, s0 โ โ, hs1 โ โ, (c2[ร](s0[+]hs1))=((c2[ร]s0)[+](c2[ร]hs1)))
  adddi(c2, s0, hs1)
  syl6eleq(hs0, (โคโฅ ` c0), c4, (w0 โง hs0 โ c4))
  simpr(w0, hs0 โ c4)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 โ c4, s0 โ(c0[...]hs0), (c5 ` s0)โ โ)
  sylan2(w0, s0 โ(c0[...]hs0), (c5 ` s0)โ โ, s0 โ c4)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 โ c4, s0 โ(c0[...]hs0), (c1 ` s0)=(c2[ร](c5 ` s0)))
  sylan2(w0, s0 โ(c0[...]hs0), (c1 ` s0)=(c2[ร](c5 ` s0)), s0 โ c4)
  syl6eleqr(s0, c4, (โคโฅ ` c0), s0 โ(c0[...]hs0))
  elfzuz(s0, c0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(seq(c0(+, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(seq(c0(+, c5)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cmul)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 โ c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.name: climlec2
blocks.content: Comparison of a constant to the limit of a sequence. (Contributed by NM, 28-Feb-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climlec2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, cli, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(c0, cle, cfv(c4, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  climle(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, cxp(cz, csn(c0)), c4, w0)
  sylancl(w0, wbr(cxp(cz, csn(c0)), cli, c0), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat0, cz))
  recnd(c0, w0)
  0z()
  climconst2(c0, nat0, cz)
  uzssz(nat0)
  zex()
  eqeltrd(cfv(cxp(cz, csn(c0)), cv(s0)), cr, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c0, cr))
  eqbrtrd(cfv(cxp(cz, csn(c0)), cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cfv(cxp(cz, csn(c0)), cv(s0)), c0), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  eleq2s(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cuz, c3), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  eluzelz(cv(s0), c3)
  fvconst2g(c0, cr, cv(s0), cz)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cz, csn(c0))
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
}

thm climlec2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  โข (w0 โ c0[โค]c1)

blocks.name: iserle
blocks.content: Comparison of the limits of two infinite series. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 12-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Feb-2014.)

thm iserle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cli, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c5), cli, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c5, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), diffsc(s0, c0))

  climle(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cseq(c3, caddc, c5), w0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c2, cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cr, w0)
  serfre(s0, c3, c4, c2, w0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c2, cseq(c3, caddc, c5), cr, w0)
  serfre(s0, c3, c5, c2, w0)
  serle(s0, c3, c4, cv(hs0), c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  syl6eleq(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c3), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cr), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cr), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c5, cv(s0))), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  simpll(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0))))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  syl6eleqr(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cuz, c3), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0))))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c3, caddc, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c3, caddc, c5))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm iserge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  sylan2(w0, s0 โ(c1[...]hs0), (c0 ` s0)โ โ, s0 โ(โคโฅ ` c1))
  elfzuz(s0, c1, hs0)
  syldan(w0, s0 โ(โคโฅ ` c1), (c0 ` s0)โ โ, s0 โ c3)

  sylan2(w0, s0 โ(c1[...](hs0[-]1)), (c0 ` s0)[โค](c0 `(s0[+]1)), s0 โ(โคโฅ ` c1))
  elfzuz(s0, c1, (hs0[-]1))
  syldan(w0, s0 โ(โคโฅ ` c1), (c0 ` s0)[โค](c0 `(s0[+]1)), s0 โ c3)
  sylan(w0, s0 โ(โคโฅ ` c1), s0 โ c3, c1 โ c3)
  uztrn2(c1, c3, s0, c4)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((โคโฅ ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, (c0 ` c1)โ โ)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c0 ` c1), cr)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, (c0 ` hs0)โ โ)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c0 ` hs0), cr)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, hs0)

blocks.name: climserle
blocks.content: The partial sums of a converging infinite series with nonnegative terms are bounded by its limit. (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climserle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2), cle, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2), cle, c3)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2), cle, c3)), diffsc(s0, c3))
  climub(hs0, cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2, c3, c4, c0, w0)
  breqtrrd(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), caddc, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wbr(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), cle, co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), caddc, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), c4))
  impcom(w0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), c4), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))
  vtoclga(s0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), c4, wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))
  expcom(wcel(cv(s0), c4), w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  addge01d(cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c4, cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cr, w0)
  serfre(s0, c0, c1, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  syl6eleq(c2, cfv(cuz, c0), c4, w0)
  eluzel2(c2, c0)
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cr), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), c4))
  peano2uzs(cv(hs0), c4, c0)
  impcom(w0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), c4), wcel(cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cr))
  vtoclga(s0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), c4, wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cr)), wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), w0, wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cr))
  eleq1d(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), c1)
  expcom(wcel(cv(s0), c4), w0, wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), caddc, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  syl6eleq(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0), c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  seqp1(cv(hs0), c0, caddc, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c0, caddc, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, nat0, cle, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, wcel(cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cr))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cr)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}
